img_above_text:
![Wukong Bamboo 16.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/b5/Wukong_Bamboo_16.jpg)
His most standard attack includes a series of swipes with both arms that sends him forward, ending in a small leaping splash attack that allows him to reposition. By dodging the first swipe to the side, you can wait for him to leap back towards you and then use Immobilize to keep in place while you attack. He can also use any of these swipes and slams independently as well as in a three-hit combo, so look for a follow-up attack before deciding to commit to countering with your own attacks.
img_below_text:
There are two extremely fast and damaging attacks you’ll need to beware of. The first comes when he’s directly facing you, and the toad will pause momentarily lowering his arms across his chest. He’ll then lunge at you belly first in an extremely quick dash, and you’ll have to dodge the body slam quickly to the side before striking back.
![Wukong Bamboo 17.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/a/a3/Wukong_Bamboo_17.jpg)
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Bamboo 16.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/b5/Wukong_Bamboo_16.jpg)
His most standard attack includes a series of swipes with both arms that sends him forward, ending in a small leaping splash attack that allows him to reposition. By dodging the first swipe to the side, you can wait for him to leap back towards you and then use Immobilize to keep in place while you attack. He can also use any of these swipes and slams independently as well as in a three-hit combo, so look for a follow-up attack before deciding to commit to countering with your own attacks."
        - Following Text: "There are two extremely fast and damaging attacks you’ll need to beware of. The first comes when he’s directly facing you, and the toad will pause momentarily lowering his arms across his chest. He’ll then lunge at you belly first in an extremely quick dash, and you’ll have to dodge the body slam quickly to the side before striking back.
![Wukong Bamboo 17.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/a/a3/Wukong_Bamboo_17.jpg)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a boss fight in *Black Myth: Wukong* against "Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang," a large toad-like enemy. The toad is shown mid-attack, lunging forward with its arms outstretched in a dynamic motion. This aligns with the guide's description of its fast, damaging attacks, such as a belly-first lunge that players must dodge quickly to avoid damage. The environment features lush greenery and a carved stone backdrop, adding to the setting's immersive detail. The player's health and ability bars are visible in the HUD, indicating active combat.
